description:
A theatrical compilation film released nationwide at Aeon Cinemas on August 23rd. The basic content is a look back at the best battles in the anime so far, with voice actors Kawahara Yoshihisa, who plays Mr. Most, and Sunshine Ikezaki, who participates in the theme song, appearing as voice actors. There are no new battles, but all other BGM and commentary will be replaced.
source: wikipedia\googletranslate

titles.title: Sai-Kyo-Oh! Zukan: The Ultimate Battles - Tamashi no Sakebi!
最強王図鑑 ~The Ultimate Battles~ 魂の叫び!
